WRITING.TEXT: I work for McCann and I can assure you this was definitely an advertisement. They originally were going to use a cow.

WRITING.TITLE: Summer Reading, oil on canvas, 48" x 36"

WRITING.TEXT: Thanks, still working on my portfolio site, I've been posting to instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mconnors_art/
thanks, I just got a new studio in LIC, so I'll be painting a lot more
